## Planned Usage

```python
import orangic

# Coming soon!
client = orangic.Orangic(api_key="your-api-key")

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="orangic-1",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Hello!"}
    ]
)
```
